reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson explains complex concepts clearly. Her enthusiasm for physics is contagious!

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant teacher! Prof. Chen's practical approach to coding made the course incredibly valuable.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but lectures can be dry. More interactive sessions would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Kim is always available for extra help. Appreciate his patience.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's lab sessions are fantastic! She makes organic chemistry understandable and fun.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are disorganized. Prof. Wilson seems knowledgeable but struggles to convey information effectively.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer with lots of real-world examples. Dr. Garcia's research insights are fascinating.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor has extensive knowledge, but grading can be inconsistent. Feedback is sometimes vague.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's class discussions are thought-provoking. She expertly relates economic theory to current events.

reviews.subject: Electrical Engineering
reviews.review: Challenging course material, but Prof. Lee's practical demos make concepts easier to grasp.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting topics, but Dr. White could improve on facilitating more class participation.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez's passion for art is infectious. His virtual museum tours are a highlight!

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Cohen encourages critical thinking. Her balanced approach to controversial topics is commendable.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Course content feels outdated. Prof. O'Brien could benefit from incorporating more digital marketing strategies.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Nguyen's field trips bring the subject to life. Her commitment to sustainability is inspiring.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Ivanov's Socratic method of teaching encourages deep thinking. Challenging but rewarding course.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Williams is clearly an expert, but her lectures can be hard to follow. More visual aids would help.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Clark's interactive approach to music theory is fantastic. His enthusiasm is contagious!

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson's course opened my eyes to the complexity of language. Her assignments are creative and engaging.

reviews.subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Prof. Al-Farsi brings valuable real-world experience, but course structure could be improved for better flow.
